carouselData.desc: We have been a professional CNC lathe supplier since 1986

carouselData.title: Experience
carouselData.desc: We serve you with our 40 years of experience

aboutSection.title: EMIR OTOMAT CNC
aboutSection.subtitle:
Your Reliable Supplier
Advanced Technology
Powerful Solutions
aboutSection.description1: Since 1986, equipped with advanced technology, we offer the most suitable solutions for customer needs as Emir Otomat CNC.
aboutSection.description2: Our company, founded in 1986, continues its services with professional work in the sector.
aboutSection.description3: Since our establishment, we have continued to be a professional supplier to leading companies in the industry.
aboutSection.description4: Our company has always maintained production quality and machine lines with the most up-to-date technologies, alongside our professional team, from past to present.
aboutSection.description5: With our Index, Revolver, CNC Lathe MACHINES , we continue to be your supplier, while also serving as a supplier to sectors such as Furniture Industry, Household Appliances, Medical Equipment, Lighting Parts, Automotive Parts, Air Conditioning Parts, Natural Gas Parts, and Defense Industry.

experienceSection.title: From Start to Finish
experienceSection.subtitle: Quality
experienceSection.item1:
TS EN ISO 9001 certified,
ISO 14001 / TS ISO 10002

ourWorksSection.title: Our Works
ourWorksSection.description: We produce special solutions for various sectors such as Furniture Industry, Home Appliances, Medical Supplies, Lighting Parts, Automotive Parts, Air Conditioning Parts, Natural Gas Parts, and Defense Industry.

history.1986: Established as Deniz Automat Automotive Limited Company in Unkapanı.
history.2004: We moved to İkitelli Demirciler Industrial Site and the company's name was changed to "GÖRKEM AUTOMAT AUTOMOTIVE AND INDUSTRIAL SUB-INDUSTRY TRADE LIMITED COMPANY".
history.2013: We integrated Industry 4.0 technology into our company.
history.2014: We added CNC Lathe Machines to our machinery.
history.2018: We obtained the ISO 9001:2015 International Standard Quality Certificate.
history.2021: We changed the company name to "EMIR AUTOMAT CNC MACHINERY INDUSTRY AND TRADE LIMITED COMPANY".
history.2024: We obtained ISO 14001:2015, TS ISO 10002:2018, and ISO 31000:2009 certifications, achieving international standards in environmental management, customer satisfaction, and risk management.

visionmission.visionDesc: Recognized as a leading brand in the industry, we are a company that prioritizes customer satisfaction with high-quality products and services at global standards. Our goal is to continuously follow the latest technologies, maintain leadership in an ever-evolving industrial world, and offer sustainable solutions to our customers. We aim to be a long-term and solid presence in the industry with our approach of adding value to our customers.
visionmission.missionDesc: We aim to add value to our customers by producing and supplying high-quality industrial spare parts. Our mission is to provide our customers with affordable, high-performance, and reliable industrial spare parts to help them increase their productivity. Maximizing customer satisfaction with our professional team and strong supply chain is one of the core principles of our company.

pricing.title: Affordable Pricing
pricing.description: Our market-driven pricing policy provides a competitive advantage for our customers.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Our material quality is certified in compliance with global standards.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Customer satisfaction is one of our most important work principles.

career.title: Career
career.description: Let's work together to further strengthen our brand by focusing on modern technologies and maintaining customer satisfaction.
career.qualitiesTitle: Qualities we seek in our team members
career.qualitiesDescription: We are looking for team members who are open to innovations, have a research-oriented mindset, are organized, and adopt a team-focused approach.
career.applyDescription: If you have these qualities and would like to join our team, you can fill out the form below to apply for a job or internship.
